text: Rômulo Duncan Arantes Neto (born April 9, 1987) is a Brazilian actor. == Career == In 2007, he was the male protagonist of the fourteenth season of Malhação. Later, he was called by Rede Record and participated in Os Mutantes: Caminhos do Coração as Telê, a mutant bandit league, remaining with the role in Mutantes: Promessas de Amor. In 2013 he signed a contract with Rede Globo to perform in Sangue Bom, playing his first villain, Tito Rabelo. In 2014, he was considered for two roles, and eventually assumed the role of Roberto, who was originally Klebber Toledo, in Império. ==Personal life== He dated Lise Grendene and the director of soap operas Amora Mautner. In 2013, he took up a relationship with actress Cléo Pires. ==Filmography== === Television === {| class="wikitable" ! Year ! Title ! Role !
